description.english: Retrieve an ancient sword from the well.
You scavenge through rubbish.
Obtain a medicinal plant.
Pull out the sword from the stone.
Pull out the giant sword from the stone.
Obtain an unidentified item.
Acquire a loyal companion.
Write a couplet for the first time.
Solve a puzzle for the first time.
Hunt down a wanted person for the first time.
Pawn a piece of belonging.
Capture a follower for the first time.
Capture a beast for the first time.
Earn a nickname for the first time.
You feel like you could use a giant hammer.
description.schinese: 感觉手里缺少一把破天锤
description.tchinese: 感覺手裏缺少一把破天錘

description.english: Old memories are haunting me.
description.schinese: 老去的记忆对我展开攻集
description.tchinese: 老去的記憶對我展開攻集

description.english: Someone's fallen into the water!
It's pretty common for people to fall off cliffs in the kungfu world!
description.schinese: 武侠世界里有人落崖是常有的事！
description.tchinese: 武俠世界裏有人落崖是常有的事！

description.english: Someone just got knocked ten feet away!
Someone gets countered with the same move!
description.schinese: 有人被人以同样的招式反击！
description.tchinese: 有人被人以同樣的招式反擊！

description.english: Ptui!
Launch a quick 3-hit combo!
You trip over a fuse...
You made a mistake while drunk!
Again!
Yes, got that treasure!
Unfortunately, you're defeated...
Learn a real kungfu technique.
description.schinese: 学习了一本真正的武学
description.tchinese: 學習了一本真正的武學

description.english: Master the essence of a kungfu technique.
description.schinese: 掌握了一门武学的奥义
description.tchinese: 掌握了一門武學的奧義

description.english: Enhance a piece of gear.
Enhance a piece of superior gear.
Create a kungfu.
Created a 10-star kungfu.
Make a kungfu breakthrough.
Reset your TP.
Remove all the kungfu you've learned.
Bring an item to a new playthrough.
Enter the world of kungfu because of Shangguan Nan.
description.schinese: 被上官楠拐上了江湖路
description.tchinese: 被上官楠拐上了江湖路

description.english: Seek protection from the Feather Robes.
Make peace with Wang Haifeng and Shangguan Nan.
description.schinese: 与王害风上官楠等人冰释前嫌
description.tchinese: 與王害風上官楠等人冰釋前嫌

description.english: With a lifetime of companionship, you're beyond grateful.
Participate in the Jiangnan Hero Contest as a kungfu practitioner.
description.schinese: 以武林人身份参与江南水陆大会
description.tchinese: 以武林人身份參與江南水陸大會

description.english: Participate in the Yuelu Music Festival as a kungfu practitioner.
description.schinese: 以武林人身份参与岳麓听琴大会
description.tchinese: 以武林人身份參與嶽麓聽琴大會

description.english: Participate in the Bashu Kungfu Championship as a kungfu practitioner.
description.schinese: 以武林人身份参与巴蜀盟主大会
description.tchinese: 以武林人身份參與巴蜀盟主大會

description.english: Participate in the Beggar Gang's Gathering as a kungfu practitioner.
description.schinese: 以武林人身份参与丐帮聚贤大会
description.tchinese: 以武林人身份參與丐幫聚賢大會

description.english: Witness Wanyan Yong's promise in Nanyang.
description.schinese: 见证完颜雍的南阳盟誓
description.tchinese: 見證完顏雍的南陽盟誓

description.english: Fight at the top of the Great Heavenly Kings Temple.
Meet the two masters at Mt. Zhong'nan again.
Witness the birth of the earliest Quanzhen disciples on Mt. Zhong'nan.
Participate in the World Kungfu Competition as a kungfu practitioner.
description.schinese: 以武林人身份参与天下第一武林大会
description.tchinese: 以武林人身份參與天下第一武林大會

description.english: Obtain a fine horse!
It feels good the next morning!
Wow, I found some dirty secrets!
description.schinese: 哇哦，发现不得了的脏东西！
description.tchinese: 哇哦，發現不得了的髒東西！

description.english: Big brother!
King of beasts!
Get to max level by stepping on others' toes!
Ya-dah!
No one can stop me now!
I go my way without complaint!
Join the Wulu Palace!
Lead the Wulu Palace to win the World Kungfu Competition!
description.schinese: 带领金乌王府赢得天下第一！
description.tchinese: 帶領金烏王府贏得天下第一！

description.english: Become Jin's emissary to the Western Regions with Zhuhu Mou.
description.schinese: 和祝虎谋成为金国联络西方的使者！
description.tchinese: 和祝虎謀成為金國聯絡西方的使者！

description.english: Lead Shaolin Temple to win the World Kungfu Competition!
description.schinese: 带领少林寺赢得天下第一！
description.tchinese: 帶領少林寺贏得天下第一！

description.english: Lead Quanzhen to win the World Kungfu Competition!
description.schinese: 带领全真道赢得天下第一！
description.tchinese: 帶領全真道贏得天下第一！

description.english: Lead the Mt. Heng Clan to win the World Kungfu Competition!
description.schinese: 带领衡山派赢得天下第一！
description.tchinese: 帶領衡山派贏得天下第一！

description.english: Succeed as the Grandmaster of the Mt. Heng Clan!
Lead the Prodigy of the East's disciples to win the World Kungfu Competition!
description.schinese: 带领东书门人赢得天下第一！
description.tchinese: 帶領東書門人贏得天下第一！

description.english: Lead the Langhuan Pavilion's disciples to win the World Kungfu Competition!
description.schinese: 带领琅环阁门人赢得天下第一！
description.tchinese: 帶領琅環閣門人贏得天下第一！

description.english: Win the World Kungfu Competition as the Recluse of the North's disciple!
description.schinese: 以北孤传人身份赢得天下第一！
description.tchinese: 以北孤傳人身份贏得天下第一！

description.english: Lead Little East's disciples to win the World Kungfu Competition!
description.schinese: 带领小江东赢得天下第一！
description.tchinese: 帶領小江東贏得天下第一！

description.english: Become one of the Nine Heroes of Little East!
Dominate the competition with Chief Tong, the Masked Scholar, and Fox!
description.schinese: 与童老大、鬼面书生、阿狐一起称霸全场！
description.tchinese: 與童老大、鬼面書生、阿狐一起稱霸全場！

description.english: Dominate the competition as the Langhuan Pavilion Master!
description.schinese: 以琅环阁主身份称霸全场！
description.tchinese: 以琅環閣主身份稱霸全場！

description.english: Dominate the competition as the rebellious disciple of the Recluse of the North!
description.schinese: 以北孤逆徒身份称霸全场！
description.tchinese: 以北孤逆徒身份稱霸全場！

description.english: Dominate the competition as a born loner!
description.schinese: 以天煞孤星身份称霸全场！
description.tchinese: 以天煞孤星身份稱霸全場！

description.english: Break the Bucket Lotus Formation as the Ragged Ranger!
description.schinese: 以破庙大侠身份大破水桶莲花阵！
description.tchinese: 以破廟大俠身份大破水桶蓮花陣！

description.english: Referring to Shangyin, the wheel of fate begins to turn!
description.schinese: 参出商隐的命运之轮开始转动！
description.tchinese: 參出商隱的命運之輪開始轉動！

description.english: Become one of the Mt. Hua Four!
Travel the martial world hand in hand with your martial arts partner.
description.schinese: 与江湖情侣携手游历江湖
description.tchinese: 與江湖情侶攜手遊歷江湖

description.english: Why are there such bizarre things in the world of kungfu?
description.schinese: 为什么武侠世界也有这种怪东西？
description.tchinese: 為什麼武俠世界也有這種怪東西？

description.english: The Shura King who swept across the martial arts world and the endless purgatory!
description.schinese: 横扫武林无间炼狱的修罗之王！
description.tchinese: 橫掃武林無間煉獄的修羅之王！
